body.text: It was Lucy's first day in her
new job on a pirate ship.
She didn't know what to expect, but she was excited.
Her mother had been a pirate captain,
and it had always been Lucy's dream, too.
Her father was a shop keeper on Pirate Island.
When Lucy told him she was going to join a pirate crew,
he sighed sadly,
but packed her a bag of clothes,
and her favorite book,
and sent her on her to the docks.
Lucy stood on the dock by the ship.
It was very early.
She looked up at the tall masts,
with their sails.
The sails had holes.
She looked at the side of the ship.
It didn't look very clean.
She looked at the pirates.
They didn't look very clean, either.
'Is this the right ship?' Lucy asked.
She looked carefully.
The ship had a name on it,
under the sea slime.
The name was 'Monkey Puzzle'.
'It's the right ship,' she said.
A large pirate walked over to her.
'Lucy? I am the First Mate
of the Monkey Puzzle.
You can call me First Mate Bob.'
Lucy looked at First Mate Bob.
He had a big red parrot,
sitting on his head.
The parrot said 'You can call me First Mate Parrot.'
